activity.name: Hollywood Walk of Fame
activity.description: A famous sidewalk celebrating the stars of the entertainment industry.

activity_details.driving_info: 30 min drive from West Covina, CA.
activity_details.description: Stroll along the iconic Hollywood Walk of Fame and take pictures with your favorite stars.

activity.name: Hollywood Sign Viewpoint
activity.description: A popular viewpoint to see the iconic Hollywood Sign.

activity_details.driving_info: 15 min drive from Hollywood Walk of Fame.
activity_details.description: Enjoy a scenic view of the Hollywood Sign and take family photos.
activity_details.why_its_suitable: Great outdoor activity with stunning views.

activity.name: Lunch at Musso & Frank Grill
activity.description: Classic Hollywood restaurant known for its steaks and old-school charm.

activity_details.driving_info: 5 min drive from Hollywood Sign Viewpoint.
activity_details.description: Enjoy a delicious lunch at this historic restaurant.
activity_details.why_its_suitable: Family-friendly menu with a classic atmosphere.

activity.name: Los Angeles County Museum of Art (LACMA)
activity.description: The largest art museum in the west, featuring a diverse collection.

activity_details.driving_info: 20 min drive from Musso & Frank Grill.
activity_details.description: Explore the vast collections of art and enjoy family-friendly exhibits.
activity_details.why_its_suitable: Educational and engaging for all ages.

activity.name: Dinner at The Bazaar by José Andrés
activity.location: 465 La Cienega Blvd, Los Angeles, CA
activity.description: Innovative Spanish cuisine in a vibrant setting.

activity_details.description: Experience a unique dining experience with creative dishes.
activity_details.why_its_suitable: Fun atmosphere with a diverse menu.

day_plans.return_to_hotel_driving_info: 30 min drive back to West Covina, CA.

activity.name: Santa Monica Pier

activity_details.description: Enjoy fresh seafood with a view of the ocean.
